samples.name: Default Functionalities
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 TreeMap control visualizes the sales of cars across various countries in 2017.

samples.name: Layout
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 TreeMap control illustrates the GDP nominal of top 10 countries in the year 2015. The layout of the TreeMap can also be changed.

samples.name: Drilldown
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 TreeMap control demonstrates drill-down with the continents at the top level followed by regions and countries.

samples.name: Customization
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 TreeMap control depicts the gold medal categories of the 2016 US Summer Olympics. Each category is denoted with label template.

samples.name: Data Label
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 TreeMap control depicts the population level of various countries in 2017 along with data labels.

samples.name: Tooltip
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 TreeMap control depicts the number of international airports available in various countries in South America along with tooltip.

samples.name: Legend
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 TreeMap control visualizes the 2016 U.S.A. presidential election results. Default and interactive are the two types of legend.

samples.name: Selection & Highlight
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 TreeMap control depicts the details of goods imported by Japan. Selection and highlight options have been enabled.

samples.name: Print & Export
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 TreeMap control depicts the top 10 best-selling smartphone brands. Print and export options have been enabled.

samples.name: TreeMap with Pie
samples.description: This demo for Essential JS2 TreeMap control visualizes the population level of various continents in 2011 based on the gender and age group.
